description: Insulin receptor pathway in C. elegans Initial version based on review by [Gami and Wolkow](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/16441841) of pathways that affect ageing.  The DAF-2 gene encodes for the insulin-like growth factor 1 (IGF-1) receptor in the worm Caenorhabditis elegans. C. elegans with a diet of low glucose, reduced Daf-16 activity and worms lifespan was shortened compared to worms fed on media without glucose.
title: daf-2 or insulin signaling pathway
